Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:10#10#baykun warthogs} are cutting our troops to ribbons. They're mean, nasty, and tough as nails, so kill them , but carefullyâ€”I want you to bring back some of the soft fur on their backs.

We'll trade it in Cutthroat Harbor for much-needed supplies.
Just walk around our camp. You'll run into them in no time.
